name: Voodoo
description:
Champion The Call Of Your Tribe!Voodoo is an online multiplayer open-world survival game set amidst the fantasy wildlife of primal Africa. Godly and earthly are not yet clearly defined, and humankind is on the brink of civilization. Champion the call of your tribe by building your village, gathering and crafting resources, farming and hunting for food, and battling for territory and domination.Survival Is Tribal!Whether you're joining friends or forging new alliances, teamwork is vital to survival in Voodoo. To thrive you will need to produce food, build housing and fortifications, develop weapons and equipment, and fight with might and magic! There's a role for everyone. Will you bring your village to prosperity by being a fearsome warrior, a relentless farmer, or a powerful shaman?Battle The Colossi Of Evolution!In Voodoo a race of colossi known as Izimu holds power over evolution! To advance your tribe and learn new technologies in this fierce and ancient world, you will have to defeat these giant gods and seize their knowledge!Naturalistic Open-World Freedom!It's the advent of civilization. You are a human, born of the wild. Naked. Where you go, where you settle, what you do, how you dress, who you become -- it's entirely up to you! Voodoo takes you on a journey of true self-discovery and puts your wits and everything you've ever learned about survival to the ultimate test.Alternating Landscapes!Explore a vibrating ecosystem of prehistoric flora and fauna. Your survival adventure in Voodoo will take you across majestic jungles, shimmering savannahs, and sun-baked deserts. But stay alert! One step too far over the wrong horizon could land you in the middle of warring tribes or an Izimu's wrath!Hidden Treasures Of Ubuntu"I am what I am because of who we all are," say the elders of ancient Africa. Besides from defeating Izimus, tribes that progress on a firm foundation in Voodoo are those that invest in learning the wisdom of the elders. Embark on a treasure-hunt across the vast blood lands of Voodoo and find the artefacts that hold the secrets of the ages.***KEY FEATURES***Open-World Multiplayer Survival
  • Begin stark naked and develop how, when, and where you want to! Honest diplomacy or devious roguery will define your place in this new society.

Construction
  • Build shelter and fortifications for your tribe, including outpost towers and booby-traps for any who dare to invade your village!

Crafting System
  • Craft weapons according to your own particular combat style. Combine different materials to develop up to 8000 varied weapons!

Colossi
  • Challenge the god-status of the Izimu in colossal battles that will end with your blood staining the ground, or a totem in your tribe's possession!

Playthrough
  • Designed literally for infinite hours of gameplay leading towards constant evolution in competitive combat, subsistence and/or recreational hunting, technology, and infrastructure!
